'''Fíriel Fairbairn''' was a Hobbit of the [[Westmarch]] of the [[Shire]].
==History==
Fíriel was the daughter of [[Fastred of Greenholm]] and [[Elanor Gardner]] and flourished in the first century of the [[Fourth Age]].<ref name="Preface">{{AB|Preface}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Fíriel'' was likely named after [[Fíriel (The Last Ship)|Fíriel]], the character from the song ''[[The Last Ship]]'' and/or [[Fíriel|the Gondorian princess]] she was based on. The name means "mortal woman" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Preface"/>
